feed.title: Dozzle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v6.4.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Deactivates collection of stats after 6 hours of idle  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2830 (0ca66)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes parsing of logfmt logs with a regex. fixes #2834  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2835 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2834 (993b3)
  • deps:
  • Update dependency date-fns to ^3.6.0  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2832 (cb99b)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2837 (f9aab)

   üèé Performance

  • Makes messages for copy and paste lazy for minor perf improvement  -  by @amir20 (09a98)
  • Adds caching and brotli  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2826 (c2fce)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v6.4.1
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • This fixes a critical bug where multiple stat collectors were competing and never stopping. see #2838  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2839 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2838 (b72ee)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v6.4.2
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Hides per page dropdown when total number of containers is less than a page  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2849 (3a254)
  • Improves icons placement for expanding json  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2854 (9c1b9)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2840 (e6430)
  • Update module github.com/docker/docker to v26  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2841 (2d7c8)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2843 (192d3)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2846 (293f6)
  • Update dependency unplugin-vue-macros to ^2.7.13  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2848 (d55e5)
  • Update dependency @intlify/unplugin-vue-i18n to v4  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2853 (21c77)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v6.4.3
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes background color with ansi colors. fixes #2873  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2874 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2873 (9b641)
  • Tries to reconnect of remote host disconnects  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2876 (83f48)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2857 (783b7)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2872 (d09e1)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v6.4.4
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes actions with new routes. fixes #2883  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2884 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2883 (9aaae)
